statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -8 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -18 \\ 1 \\ -7 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -21 \\ 22 \\ -3 \\ 9 \\ 16 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
